name: Peepci Mahn
description:
- Loading may take time on slower computers! -

a quality game made by a couple of quality people.

Game Info:

Peepci Mahn discovered that those Red Pizza commies were lurking around in HIS neighborhood. He needs your help to put an end to it, before they launch their "secret weapon".

Controls:

WASD - Movement

L SHIFT - Sprint

Mouse - Look Around

CTRL or Left Click - Shoot

Right Click - Aim

Space - Jump

ESC or P - Pause

Pepsiman type stuff yknow yknow
